tns:patch.author: Alexandru Artimon patched by Dolghier Constantin (AMP-14440)
tns:patch.description: recreate view, this will always be the last version of the view

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS v_donor_funding CASCADE; CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_donor_funding AS SELECT f.amp_activity_id, f.amp_funding_id, fd.amp_fund_detail_id, d.name AS donor_name, fd.transaction_type, fd.adjustment_type, cval5.category_value AS adjustment_type_name, fd.transaction_date, fd.transaction_amount, fd.pledge_id, c.currency_code, cval.id AS terms_assist_id, cval.category_value AS terms_assist_name, fd.fixed_exchange_rate, b.org_grp_name, ot.org_type AS donor_type_name, cval2.category_value AS financing_instrument_name, cval2.id AS financing_instrument_id, d.amp_org_id AS org_id, d.org_grp_id, ot.amp_org_type_id AS org_type_id, cval3.category_value AS mode_of_payment_name, cval3.id AS mode_of_payment_id, cval4.category_value AS funding_status_name, cval4.id AS funding_status_id, fd.capital_spend_percent, agr.code AS agreement_code, (agr.title::text || ' - '::text) || agr.code::text AS agreement_title_code, fd.recipient_org_id AS recipient_id, recipient_org.name AS recipient_name, recipient_role.role_code AS recipient_role_code, recipient_role.name AS recipient_role_name, source_role.role_code AS source_role_code, source_role.name AS source_role_name, pld_t.category_value AS activity_pledges_title_name,pld_t.id as activity_pledges_title_id FROM amp_funding f LEFT JOIN amp_role source_role ON f.source_role_id = source_role.amp_role_id LEFT JOIN amp_category_value cval2 ON f.financing_instr_category_value = cval2.id LEFT JOIN amp_category_value cval3 ON f.mode_of_payment_category_va = cval3.id LEFT JOIN amp_category_value cval4 ON f.funding_status_category_va = cval4.id LEFT JOIN amp_agreement agr ON f.agreement = agr.id, amp_funding_detail fd LEFT JOIN amp_category_value cval5 ON fd.adjustment_type = cval5.id LEFT JOIN amp_funding_pledges fp ON fd.pledge_id = fp.id LEFT JOIN amp_category_value pld_t ON pld_t.id = fp.title LEFT JOIN amp_organisation recipient_org ON fd.recipient_org_id = recipient_org.amp_org_id LEFT JOIN amp_role recipient_role ON fd.recipient_role_id = recipient_role.amp_role_id, amp_category_value cval, amp_currency c, amp_organisation d, amp_org_group b, amp_org_type ot WHERE c.amp_currency_id = fd.amp_currency_id AND f.amp_funding_id = fd.amp_funding_id AND cval.id = f.type_of_assistance_category_va AND d.amp_org_id = f.amp_donor_org_id AND d.org_grp_id = b.amp_org_grp_id AND ot.amp_org_type_id = b.org_type
UNION ALL
SELECT apb.amp_activity_id, apb.amp_annual_project_budget_id AS amp_funding_id, apb.amp_annual_project_budget_id AS amp_fund_detailid, NULL as donor_name, 15 AS transaction_type, (select acv.id from amp_category_value acv JOIN amp_category_class acc ON acv.amp_category_class_id = acc.id WHERE acc.keyname='adjustment_type' and acv.category_value='Actual') AS adjustment_type, 'Actual' as adjustment_type_name, apb.year AS transaction_date, apb.amount AS transaction_amount, NULL as pledge_id, c.currency_code AS currency_code, NULL as terms_assist_id, NULL as terms_assist_name, NULL as fixed_exchange_rate, NULL as org_grp_name, NULL as donor_type_name, NULL as financing_instrument_name, NULL as financing_instrument_id, NULL as org_id, NULL as org_grp_id, NULL as org_type_id, NULL AS mode_of_payment_name, NULL AS mode_of_payment_id, NULL as funding_status_name, NULL as funding_status_id, NULL as capital_spend_percent, NULL as agreement_code, NULL as agreement_title_code, NULL as recipient_id, NULL as recipient_name, NULL as recipient_role_code, NULL AS recipient_role_name, 'DN' AS source_role_code, 'Donor' AS source_role_name, NULL as activity_pledges_title_name, NULL as activity_pledges_title_id FROM amp_annual_project_budget apb JOIN amp_currency c ON c.amp_currency_id = apb.amp_currency_id
ORDER BY amp_activity_id;
